attributes.action: SEISS for those who have been self employed for less than 3 years.
attributes.additional_details: I have seen how badly small businesses have been effected by COVID 19 including myself. And those who haven’t got a full year of returns haven’t received any help what so ever. We must be treated equally to every tax payer. It seems this topic has been overlooked.
attributes.background: New small businesses who haven’t had a full years returns must have some sort of payment scheme to help.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Change the criteria for SEISS grants for 2019-2020 tax year traders: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333321

Extend income replacement schemes to those who don't currently qualify: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560845
